EmailTemplate.name: ACT â€“ Olathe/Redmond Transition Transaction Delay
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Case.Subject} : {!Case.CaseNumber}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for sending your request to Honeywell Aerospace. My name is {!Case.OwnerFirstName} and I am working your request. As previously notified due to our transition for Olathe supported products into our SAP system your request may be delayed. From September 25th through October 6th, we are unable to enter orders or quotes into the system. We apologize for any disruptions this may cause, but will ensure to resume normal operations as quickly as possible when the new system is online and ready to accept your request.
You do not need to respond to this notice; we will notify you as soon as your request has been entered into our new system, after this transition is completed.
If you are in an AOG situation, please contact our AOG support team at AOG@honeywell.com or call directly at 1-800-301-6099, option 4 or 1-602-365-3099, option 4.
Thank you for your business {!Case.OwnerFirstName}
